mapper.select: SELECT tm.id AS columnId, tm.`name` AS columnName, a.article_id AS articleId, a.article_title AS articleTitle, a.pushTime AS pushTime, a.pushNum AS pushNum, CASE WHEN b.openNum IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.openNum END AS openNum FROM (SELECT t.fk_article_id AS article_id,t.article_title,COUNT(1) AS pushNum,DATE(t.push_time) AS pushTime FROM t_subscriber_push t WHERE DATE(t.push_time) = DATE(#{date}) GROUP BY t.fk_article_id ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.fk_article_id AS article_id,COUNT(1) AS openNum FROM t_article_stat t LEFT JOIN t_subscriber_push tp ON t.fk_wx_user_id = tp.fk_wx_user_id AND t.fk_article_id = tp.fk_article_id WHERE DATE(tp.push_time) = DATE(#{date}) AND DATE(tp.push_time) = DATE(t.create_time) AND t.type ='0' GROUP BY t.fk_article_id) b ON a.article_id = b.article_id INNER JOIN t_article ta ON a.article_id = ta.id INNER JOIN t_menu tm ON tm.id = ta.fk_menu_id
